website_summaries.verdict: A plumping lip gloss that includes peptides and hyaluronic acid to boost collagen and smooth fine lines on the lips over time.
pros: Has a pleasant texture that's creamy and soft without any tackiness
The colors are subtle with a light shimmer
Comes in 12 lovely nude shades to complement every skin tone
From a cruelty-free drugstore brand known for their high-quality
cons: Requires frequent reapplication to keep the shine

customer_reviews.title: Barely a Hint of Color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Rosy Bronze after seeing it on Emily Noel. It looks very rich and pigmented on her, which is exactly what I want..but it must be her lighting. I have pale skin with light pink lips and it barely shows up on me. Hardly any color, not worth $9. The same thing happened with a Neutrogena gloss I just bought in the shade Pure Cider, it's almost clear. The $3 Essence glosses have way more pigment than these.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: It’s very goopy. I love the pigment and the packaging but it is very thick. It does moisturize well but I was hoping for something in the middle between the awful dryness of a matte and the feeling of Vaseline on my lips. There’s no taste or smell so for those that are sensitive, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: 73ret

customer_reviews.title: Best Glosses!!
customer_reviews.text: It's just so hard to find a brand that does a better gloss than Milani! The formula is top-notch--glossy and high shine, but never sticky. These are also so comfortable to wear and they are so easy to re-apply throughout the day. They truly do make the lips look plump & full (without the burning sensation). And I love this shade!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Plus the lip lumper
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a friend that this a light weight lip color. And she was right! It is just what a wanted. Beautiful shade! In addition, the plumber is nice to wear. Some plumper's can even sting your lips .... this one is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lawgo

customer_reviews.title: Milani
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick. Lasts a long time considering it's a gloss. Lips appear Fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Aida M.

customer_reviews.title: Great texture & price
customer_reviews.text: No flavor but definitely worth the money not a tingling feeling more of a mint fresh cool feeling the lip applicator is huge or atleast the biggest I've seen which is a good thing because I have voluminous lips great product will buy again
customer_reviews.author: GODDESS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite out of all the other ones
customer_reviews.text: The color goes great with my skin tone (it’s a very cute nude color on me) and adds just the right amount of pigment
customer_reviews.author: Lbanana

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, thick lip gloss. I have bought Milano lip gloss before and usually they tingle and have lip plumper properties. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile color
customer_reviews.text: First off, I LOVE the color and feel it's a good color for nearly every skin tone. I don't feel as if it has superior lip plumpling qualities, however I bought it more for the color and sheen. I am able to wear it as an everyday lip gloss, dress it up or down. I feel it's a bit sticky after first applying but that goes away fairly quickly. I does last for a while, but I do find I have to reapply throughout the day. Great for such an affordable lip gloss though!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Only two of three arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product-and have purchase several, but when I received my package today, it was ripped, and only two of the three I purchased were in the envelope. I rarely have a issue like this, but it isn’t allowing me to contact the seller. Want my third item.
customer_reviews.author: James bond

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nude for black people. Absolutely love this gloss. It’s so pigmented a little goes a long way and it tingles slightly. It also smells amazing and lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Calisha

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick was all I had hoped it would be! It goes on so smoothly and has a soft shine. The color Rosewood is such a lovely, natural soft rose. I didn't experience much plumping, but there is a gentle tingling when first applied. I am older, so it may be impossible to plump old lips, but it may happen over time. I love the texture, the color, and the shine, as well as how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Lip Gloss!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drugstore lipgloss, I own a couple of shades, but Rosy Bronze is my absolute favorite. These glosses make the lips so shiny and full looking, and make them appear fuller. The formula is thick, but not tacky. This is the best drugstore lipgloss out there!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Epperson

customer_reviews.title: I like it!  🥰☺️
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer : I am a medium skinned black female. Sooo I bought the shade rosewood and in the picture it's a bit darker. I love my darker shades but the color is more of a natural lip color. It's kinda like I put on some slightly pink tinted clear gloss. Overall, I still like it a lot. Yes the color was not what it was advertising but the stuff works. It smells like chocolate peppermint candy and I adore the applicator. I love the thickness of it and it tingles instead of burning like other brands. I really like it. I'm gonna buy rosewood again and maybe I'll try a different shade.
customer_reviews.author: Shannaman2342

customer_reviews.title: The best lip plumper!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t want plump lips for days? Uh, I know I do!! This lip plumper will leave your lips luscious, juicy, and very plump. There’s no sting, just intense hydration!
customer_reviews.author: Collin & Rebekah Pahle

customer_reviews.title: Great lip plumping gloss
customer_reviews.text: I really like to use this as a gloss over a darker colored lipstick. Moisturizing and has a slight lip plump without a big sting like some lip plumping gloss. Almost nude in color over bare lips, I find it to be long lasting. Another fantastic Milani product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah99

customer_reviews.title: Not full coverage but Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is thin and not full coverage. For the price it is a tool to have in my "get ready" makeup for light coverage or touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Willowbrook

customer_reviews.title: Natural color
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing a review because I love this shade! It’s the first true natural/naked color that isn’t pinkish that I’ve found. I will say it does not plump my lips at all - but the color and texture is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Obscura

customer_reviews.title: I can do without the lip plumber. But good product otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I only apply it to my bottom lip And rub my lips together to blend it out. It goes with any lip liner or on its one. Its the perfect topper to any liquid lipstick as well. My only complaint is that it is a lip plumbing product so it leaves a minty feeling that is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Fake Dupe False Advertising - DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I doubled checked the format of the Milani lip-gloss from my original gloss and also the Official Milani website. Its a complete fake. This is disappointing. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ❣
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color fuller look. Finally found the perfect lip product. Dont want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Grandt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice color
customer_reviews.text: The tingle is there, it feels nice as a gloss, but there really isn’t much plumping action going on. I do like the shade. The slight tint it gives my lips but it just isn’t much more than a lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: Diana mack

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price. That works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the gloss, it really lasted for a long time and I like that it’s a pinkish beige tone not orangish like others. I’ve found that all Milani products are of quality at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great glossy finish and color, very disappointed in lack of plumping affect
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product for it's high gloss finish and color. I was very disappointed in the fact that it had very little to no affect in the plumping of my lips. There was no tingling sensation or feeling that my lips were becoming more plump. There was no visual change in the appearance of my lips in regards to volume.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip go loss
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this plumper. It's not sticky and it actually stays on in like other glosses, it's also such a beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Pretty gloss, bad container!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. Not sticky but stopper came out after first use and now it’s hard to use as way too much product comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Soft but it’s like a milky pink not what I expected but it’s still a beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Salty&sweet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very pretty shade although it lasts maybe an hour on the lips and doesn’t plump; just feels minty.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Lip plumping gloss!
customer_reviews.text: This is fire!! I absolutely love it, it makes the lips look so plump, I am getting other colors
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Not pluming but nice shine and not to crazy of glitter
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel any plumping effect but it’s similar to the Fenty gloss but not exact dupe. I switch use it when I’m trying not to use my Fenty gloss too much
customer_reviews.author: angel thai

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it's got a light minty flavor. It looks and feels great on.
customer_reviews.author: PoolGirlie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shine
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lip gloss. Pretty color and shine. Keeps lips moist.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't thrilled at all..gooey to put on,, color was lifeless.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor girl.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee all of their lipglosses. I use it as an everyday look
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: But it didn't seem to plump my lips that I could tell. It burned/tingled for a while, but I really couldn't tell any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Lichtenstein

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite lip plumper and the colors are amazing love them all.
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIADASHMUA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t deliver
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lip gloss. Not really the color shown and does not last long. However it’s very creamy and soft. Not sticky like some. Wouldn’t buy again mostly because of color and that you continually have to the apply.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schiro

customer_reviews.title: New go-to selection
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss! It's my new go-to. Plumping. Nourishing. You lips feel... fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Morris

customer_reviews.title: Lip Plumper does not work
customer_reviews.text: All this is, is a clear gloss (no color shows up on lips) that stays wet on your lips and never plumps it up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debilaw

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS Product. I got the Nude Shimmer. It's soft, not too sticky. I wear it all day long, everyday. Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Bought in a couple different colors and like them both!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’ll work on you but it didn’t work on me I felt it working for a minute and then it didn’t last
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Love the applicator!
customer_reviews.text: If I had gotten the color I ordered this would have been perfect. Still really like it.i will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy2012

customer_reviews.title: fav
customer_reviews.text: This color is AMAZING. My everyday go to. Also super moisturizing and buttery feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: So pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the store, fell I. Love and could no longer find it anywhere. I got so many compliments, I had to get some more, I could only find it on Amazon. A bit mor expensive here, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Glistening lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: The best lip gloss and plumper around! Goes on so smoothly. The best lip gloss and plumper around! Goes on very smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Lamont

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and feel of this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great "finishing touch" to your makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: kittyfaye

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, pumps lips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this nude color! I love that it tingles a bit and the color is really nicely pigmented. If you're a nude lip color lover you will not be disappointed. Nice large size means good value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: LOVEE
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this! Perfect to place over a lipstick to create the perfect gloss look! Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip plumper.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lip plumper for a great price! Very happy Amazon had it, sometimes hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer j

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free at its best!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, cruelty free, and great price! Excellent buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Grosse

customer_reviews.title: Not a plumper.
customer_reviews.text: I mean its a nice color but not helping my lip volume...
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't order make up online I would like to see it in person first but I said what the heck! I'm really glad I did because I loooooove this lip gloss it's a little thick but not to bad and the flavor is minty. Love ittt
customer_reviews.author: Deanna p.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, but wasn't expecting it to be glittery. I'm not a fan of glitter/shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really see it on the lips. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jollyrancher07

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color but didn’t plump my lips at all. Still going to use this gloss though because of the color. Looks just like photos 👌 no flavor or smell and if your going out for drinks be ready to reapply often
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Smelled weird - will not use
customer_reviews.text: Smelled weird. Will not use. This is not up to Milani’s standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Better than MAC
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is amazing quality and shine. Pair with a pretty liner and your are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss, nice colour and feels very high end
customer_reviews.author: Abby Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the tingling sensation is really nice, not uncomfortable at all! Plus is taste amazing😂
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Milani lip plumper a don’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! My lips are prone to drying during the day and one swipe of this stuff keeps them moisturized with a beautiful shimmer coat for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McCorkle

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing lip plumper
customer_reviews.text: The Milan I lip plumper is very moisturizing. It is nice to be wearing a lip plumper that last a long time on. The color is nice and tastes refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Boxler

customer_reviews.title: Love the shine!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, true to picture. Always goes on smooth and lasts. Beautiful gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Lori brown

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: My new go to everyday lip color. It goes on easy and gives you that fresh faced look.
customer_reviews.author: L Harbor

customer_reviews.title: Love Milani Lip products 😍
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Not sticky, my lips feel soft and look glossy 💗
customer_reviews.author: Elyza

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good at all! Not worth my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: If your lips feel a tingle, then you're ready to mingle
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way my lips seemed to plump up right after application and lasted for hours. You can even feel it tingle on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Doswell

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing shiny lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, it gives a minty taste, brilliant shine, it’s long lasting, and leaves your lips very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shine, makes lips appear fuller
customer_reviews.text: Gives a beautiful shine and a hint of color. I love it! It gives a bit of fullness to my lips too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it looks natural but a hint of shine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Snuffies

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloss
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft it is on my lips. going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: mashelldra

customer_reviews.title: The longer you keep it on the better it works
customer_reviews.text: I only disliked the color but it’s a cute Pink sheer glitter
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color...
customer_reviews.text: I asked for the natural color. I received a bright pink..
customer_reviews.author: Tara Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Did not plump
customer_reviews.text: I tried this and did not see or feel a difference at all, no plumping.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick gloss topper
customer_reviews.text: It tastes awful. At one point I felt like my mouth was numb. I know why this tingles though, not my Huda beauty matte lipstick. But it was probably that combination. At one point I tasted it by mistake and YICK! Don't do it. But as you can see in my picture it does the job of lipgloss topper. As far a plumping? It tingles like it's doing something but I couldn't tell you. My lips are usually always big. But I got this for the gold look and it achieves that for me at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: AmyPond

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is luxury for a budget price! This has become my most favorite lipgloss surpassing some of my higher end brands. It goes on so smooth and not sticky, it definitely plumps your lips and just “feels” good. I have several of the colors and they all have just a tint because well they are a gloss. It wears beautiful alone or over a lipliner or your favorite matte shade. To give this gloss a low rating due to coverage is just wrong as it doesn’t claim to be a lipstick. The only negative is it finishes too fast because of how much I use them!
customer_reviews.author: MommyNblueland

customer_reviews.title: Buxom Dupe!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I didn't notice a flavor, but I did notice the tingle! I used this with a lipliner. It was recommended to me by Emily Noelle on her YouTube channel as a dupe for a Buxom lip plumping topper. Cost and value are great. My lips are much more hydrated and it lasted a good while, not sure of viability under a mask for longevity. I may get a few more colors.
customer_reviews.author: C Witt

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing lip product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and I like that it isn't overly shiny, or full of sparkle. It's great for every day wear and moisturizing on the lips. It is a little tacky, so I would avoid this product, if you dislike the feeling of tacky/sticky lip products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Everything happens for a reason; I'd plan to make a run to Sephora for the 1st Fenty universal gloss and I saw Jackie Aina on YouTube use this product. Since we are the same shade and I love little bits of sparkle, I thought I would give it a try. I am more than pleased with the results and I now have four tubes, three of this shade and one iridescent I purchased from Ulta. I am hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and the consistency of the gel as it glides on my lips. It does seem to plump my lips a little and creates a nice little tingle that I really like. But the color doesn't stay on my lips very long so I have to frequently reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Presswick10

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It has just a hint of color, or possibly just matches my lip shade perfectly it’s thick without being goopy. It’s smooth. It doesn’t last very long, but that’s fine with me. It has a nice, subtle scent of peppermint and Something else I can’t put my nose on :)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh, it’s okay... It did not plump my lips at alll but I kind of figured that.... It is a big tube of gloss so it will last pretty long. The longevity is not the best but not the worst either ...
customer_reviews.author: Mara Bicca

customer_reviews.title: Milani Keep It Full Nourishing Lip Plumper - Champagne
customer_reviews.text: I'm blonde with a very light tan and the champagne color looks almost white on my lips, it's runny, sticky, and does not plump my lips; when it wears off, my lips were dry; I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipgloss. It’s long lasting, moisturizing and I love the colors. The price is great and it works well with the lip liner. It definitely doesn’t plump, so if that’s what you’re looking for, this isn’t it. Otherwise it’s a great gloss for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I discovered this! The color is absolutely beautiful! Very moisturizing and I don’t taste a thing, that’s also a plus. Seems to last long as well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheFluff

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised of the size of the bottle. It looks very small looking at the site, but very huge in person which I like. Its worth the purchase. I am in love with the color and minty smell. Will definitely order again when the times comes.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Best lip gloss I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: First thing first, this did straight from Milani Cosmetics, so I trust it 100%. It's super moisturizing, and does live up to the plumping aspect it advertises. It's not too thick or sticky, but stays on the lips for awhile as long as you're not eating. It's a lovely color too!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: good price - color is pale
customer_reviews.text: I like Milani lip plumper- great price for the product. But the shade chart shown is off. The Soft Rose is pale, and kind of a blah nude
customer_reviews.author: LyndaFrances

customer_reviews.title: Good high end dupe
customer_reviews.text: I like this for the cost! It reminds me of much more expensive lipglosses that plump your lips but it’s much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Singer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip gloss. The gold is so pretty, not too thick not too thin, and just shimmer. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Theatricalme

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it, especially the color Rosewood.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I bought which was Rosewood. Moisturizes your lips well. Nice shine and great lip Plumper.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Disapponted
customer_reviews.text: I received wrong color. Ordered pink, received red.. Also looks different container. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty  free and great prices
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Milani products. Reasonable prices and cruelty free which I love. This lip gloss is wonderful. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA A. COOK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mauve
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the value; however, it's not as moisturizing. The "mauve" or the right nude for someone is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sepideh a.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and while it didn't make my lips bigger, I already have bigger lips.....it did plump them and reduce wrinkles! Love.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: I love this but very little plump effect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty color and it’s nice and glossy, but I rated it a little lower because I expected much more of a plumping effect. Still very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect non color color for every day
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss! This is perfect to give a little color for everyday! I love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: This is so great! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Shiny, luscious and makes my lips look thicker. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super moisturizing. Great color. Long lasting. I definitely will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Brevard

customer_reviews.title: Color didn't last
customer_reviews.text: The color didn't last very long and it didn't plump very well. It does moisturize good.
customer_reviews.author: little nanc

product_meta.title: Milani Keep It Full Nourishing Lip Plumper - Sparkling Pink (0.13 Fl. Oz.) Cruelty-Free Lip Gloss for Soft, Fuller-Looking Lips
feature_bullets: NOURISHING LIP PLUMPING GLOSS: America's favorite lip plumper!* The sheer, creamy formula in this lip plumper is infused with the best ingredients to smooth and fill lips. Features a lip maximizing applicator to deliver a silky, sheer finish in one swipe.*Nielsen US x AOC, last 52 weeks ending 8/11/18.
AVAILABLE IN 16 SHADES: Choose from 16 addictively refreshing lip colors ranging from neutrals to pretty pinks to get softer, fuller-looking lips and complete your natural look.
CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: The non-sticky formula in this lip plumping gloss includes natural peptides to stimulate collagen and Hyaluronic Acid to fill and smooth lips over time. Never tested on animals.
TIPS & TRICKS: Begin at the Cupid's bow and glide the applicator across lips in a crisscross pattern, then along the outer corners, and then on the bottom lip.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.
